entry.title: 🎉 欢迎订阅 App Store Discounts
entry.summary: 感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！
entry.content:
感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！

关于我们的 RSS 源

  • 专注于推送 App Store 应用的优惠信息
  • 只要应用价格降低或内购项降价，我们就会及时推送
  • 每个应用的优惠信息以单独的 feed 形式呈现
  • RSS 源完全开源，您可以随时查看、贡献和添加您关注的应用

找到我们

App Store Discounts

最后

如果本项目对你有帮助，请帮我们点个 ⭐️ 可好

entry.title: LUCH — Filters & Bokeh Effect
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：USD 0.29 → 免費 [免費 ~ USD 0.59]）

应用描述

LUCH Films是一款現代應用程序，用於為圖像賦予膠片攝影效果。嘗試獨特的散景效果，漏光，噪音和灰塵效果以及原始濾鏡。 20多個手提濾網 該應用程序有20多種由專業攝影師手工製作的濾鏡。它們是通用的，可模仿各種膠片和柯達和ILFORD製成，用於各種照片和色彩。 內幕故事和進給的膠片框架 我們已經將膠卷框架調整為適合現代屏幕格式，並將其添加到應用程序中，以使膠卷攝影的熱情永遠存在於我們的心靈中。 除塵效果 製作破舊的照片很容易。您不必等待20年，只需選擇35種效果之一。 漏光 您知道我們喜歡小時候看過的這些舊的漏光鏡頭。我們在LUCH FILMS中模擬了相同的閃光。 效果 如果您像我們一樣熱愛散景，那麼您絕對應該喜歡它。從35種散景和棱鏡效果中進行選擇。 沒有廣告，沒有訂閱，沒有應用內購買 完全控制您的圖像，應用與攝影師合作開發的獨特濾鏡。創建獨特的照片，包括新圖層。超過90種效果。可以對圖像應用噪點和灰塵效果，漏光，散景和棱鏡效果。 您可以為信息流或故事選擇圖像的大小，這是Instagram或其他社交網絡的理想選擇。膠卷相框也包括在LUCH膠卷中。 在Instagram上關注@luchfilmsapp，以從我們的用戶社區中汲取靈感。 我們喜歡聽到您的想法和反饋。請給我發電子郵件hello@vostokapp.ru或在Instagram上通過DM @@ luchfilmsapp向我們發送問題或建議。

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Motorsport Manager 4
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：USD 4.99 → USD 0.99 [USD 0.99 ~ USD 4.99]）

应用描述

MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success. ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination. REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars. UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry. DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey. YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you. SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: where I put it
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：USD 0.99 → 免費 [免費 ~ USD 0.99]）

应用描述

A simple cleanup management app that will quickly find your search! Do you have trouble Looking for items? Find your item quickly with "where I put it”! Build a house, make furniture, assign lockers, and put all your belongings. Books, important collections, hobby tools, children's toys, seasonal clothes, and items of recollections, the app will help you organize all things in the house.

iPhone

entry.title: Cluedo: Classic Edition
entry.content:
优惠信息

App 內購買項目

  • Ultimate Detective Collection：USD 19.99 → USD 14.99 [USD 14.99 ~ USD 19.99]

应用描述

THE ORIGINAL HASBRO BOARD GAME - It’s the classic murder mystery! Who did it? With what weapon? In which room? There’s a high-risk party at the mansion and every guest is a suspect. Roll the dice, become a detective and let Cluedo begin! • A PREMIUM DIGITAL BOARD GAME - There are no ads, no pop-ups and no pay-to-win limits. Once you buy the app, that’s it: unlimited multiplayer fun for you and your family and nothing to stop you solving the crime! • A BRAIN TEASER - Test your detective skills. At the start of each game, Cluedo will take one suspect, one weapon, and one room from the deck, and deal the rest to the players. If you ask: “was it Colonel Mustard with the Rope in the Drawing Room”, a player holding the Colonel, the Rope or the Drawing Room must show you their card. Enter every room in search of answers! • CLUESHEET & HINT SYSTEM - Who committed murder?! Don’t risk letting the criminal escape! Use your virtual cluesheet companion to make a note of the suspects, weapons and rooms you can eliminate. The ideal companion for every detective: cluesheet helps you make your deductions, perfect your strategy and solve the mystery. • FAMILY FRIENDLY - It’s the original family board game by Hasbro, suitable for all players 8 years and over. With no adverts or necessary in-app purchases it’s multiplayer fun for kids and adults. With the whole board game on your mobile you can take Cluedo wherever you go! Roll the dice and solve the mystery! • SINGLE PLAYER - Put your brain to the test against a guest list of AI murder suspects, online or offline! Choose your character, choose your opponents and let no criminal escape the mansion! • ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Play Cluedo with your friends and find out who’s guilty on mobile, PC or Nintendo Switch! Don’t let distance stop your board game night. Play on the go, or curl up in an armchair and settle down for a night of crime and detective work, wherever you are! • 10 ADDITIONAL THEMES - Explore ten different themed boards with Cluedo's Ultimate Detective’s Package. Listed under “Editor’s Choice” for the Most Stylish Game, our exclusive original themes are hand crafted by our studio artists. o Tudor Mansion: The guests at this party have turned out to be a lethal combination! o Vampire Castle: In a household where every suspect is a monster, who committed the crime? o Egyptian Adventure: Solve the crime, from the dark tombs of pharaohs to the crumbling pyramids! o Hollywood: In a land where life is an act, can you find the truth in the fairytale? o Murder Express: Challenge your friends to solve a mystery based on a classic Agatha Christie novel! o Sherlock: Become the great detective and solve a crime on the dark streets of London! o Snowy Peaks: Old friends have been reunited. Tensions are running high, but whose grudge ran that deep? o Tropical Mystery: Someone has rocked this boat in a big way! It’s a luxury race to the answer! o Venetian Masquerade: Historic Venice is beautiful, but crime lurks beneath the surface! o Wild West: From the jailhouse to the saloon, the story of Dr. Black’s end will spread far and wide. Only you can discover the truth! About Marmalade Game Studio At Marmalade Game Studio we make quality, premium multiplayer board games. Play our classic games, including Monopoly and The Game of Life 2, anywhere on your mobile! Enjoy with your friends and family whether you’re together or apart. You can find the fun with people you know or players around the world. Our games are ad-free, family friendly fun. For quality time, look for the Marmalade Game Studio logo.

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: FILCA - SLR Film Camera
entry.content:
优惠信息

App 內購買項目

  • UPGRADE PRO：USD 39.99 → USD 6.99 [USD 6.99 ~ USD 39.99]

应用描述

Filca 是一款單反膠卷相機。 35種膠卷濾鏡和電影效果讓您的照片栩栩如生。 @veteranUser "沒有Filca，你只是在收集時刻， 有了Filca，你在保存記憶。" 使用Filca的專家級手動控制精通您的拍攝。 ■ 手動模式下的快門速度、ISO、白平衡控制 ■ 來自業界領導者如Kodak、Fuji、Agfa的35mm膠卷濾鏡 Filca旨在優化您的快照體驗。 非常適合拍攝人物、自拍、夜景以及捕捉日常生活的微妙美麗。 應用我們的濾鏡，以實現真正的模擬膠片外觀。 主要特性： 帶35mm膠卷濾鏡的自動模式相機 手動模式（曝光和對焦） 對快門速度、ISO的完全控制 各種寬高比：4:3、3:2、16:9、1:1 數字變焦可放大至8倍 手動對焦控制（微距、風景） 來自Fuji、Kodak、Agfa的35mm膠卷濾鏡（包括黑白濾鏡） 膠片顆粒效果 膠片日期打印效果 光學圖像穩定 低功耗模式 自拍模式 EXIF數據存儲（包括位置數據） 人像增強 全分辨率照片 定時器和閃光燈功能 網格模式視圖 專業特性： 白平衡調整功能 日期打印功能 在Instagram上使用#filca分享您的照片，我們期待展示您的作品。 關注我們的Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/filca.app/ 使用條款：https://han.gl/HCCwV 隱私政策：https://han.gl/Wclkw 讓我們與Filca一起提升您的攝影旅程。

应用截屏

iPhone

entry.title: 13:20:Sync
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：USD 2.99 → USD 1.99 [USD 1.99 ~ USD 3.99]）

应用描述

This app puts the Mayan Dreamspell Calendar in your pocket! "13:20:Sync makes it so much easier to understand and integrate the calendar into every day life. Highly recommend it." The Mayan People have described, in breathtaking precision, the cycles of both the universe and nature around us. They created a harmonic calendar that is synchronized to all those cycles. Following these cycles can help you get a stronger connection with nature around you and become conscious of your essence. This app provides a simple way to sync along those cycles, to raise our frequency and give us a new lens to view both our day-to-day and planetary events. - Did you ever realize that our (Gregorian) calendar is not a harmonic calendar? - Did you know that the moon has 13 (not 12!) orbits around the earth in 1 year? - Why do we live with this irregular calendar? - Are you interested in Astrology? -> All this, and more, is explained carefully in this app. (over 15.000 words on 37 pages) Please note that these text are in English language only. In the New Time, synchronicity is the norm. ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 5 star rating across the world! ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// "Entertaining as well as enlightening" ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// MORE INFO: www.1320sync.com For the beginner this app is a learning tool because it contains an extensive explanation about Tones and Seals and the synchronizing order of the Mayan Astrology. You may think it's difficult at first but soon you will feel how it all connects. "This app is great, and allows easy manipulation of dates. I spent years in books doing in hours what I can now do in seconds." For the ones who are already familiar with the Mayan Calendar this app is a handy tool to navigate the cycles, and calculate the Combined Kin for any given combination. Furthermore this app can be of great assistance to teach other people about the 13:20 cycles and is used in teachings around the world. === FEATURES === + Kin Calendar This is your main Mayan Dreamspell Calendar Dashboard with all the details you need to stay in sync. Shows the Kin of today by default, and you can calculate the Kin for any other date. + Personal Notes On this new page you can keep your personal notes for the 2 main cycles of time: the Tzolkin cycle of 260 days and the 13 Moon cycle of 365 days. And with the powerful text search function you quickly find your notes. + Kin Picker Select any combination of the 13 Tones and 20 Seals. Top section can scroll to 4 pages with information. + Combined Kin Calculator Calculate the Combined Kin of any combination of Kin. You can add as many Kin as you like to calculate the Combined Kin for a group of people. + Tzolkin with indication of the GAP day's and Wavespell and more. Tap and hold to select a Kin number directly. + Contact Import All contacts in your Contacts App will be automatically imported and assigned to the correct Kin. See all your contacts with their Mayan Reading and how you relate to them. + 13 Moon Calendar Full integration of 13 Moon Calendar. (doubles as a birthday calendar!) + 13:20 Information Lots of information about the theory behind synchronization to help you navigate the Mayan Dreamspell Calendar. The texts provide a clear explanation of the Cycles of Time. (More than 15.000 words on 37 pages) Please note that these text are in English language only. + Sharing On all the 3 main tabs you can share the current selected Galactic Signature using your favorite app. # Based on the work of José Argüelles. # This app was made with permission of and in cooperation with the Foundation for the Law of Time - www.lawoftime.org, # Ariel Spilsbury.

应用截屏

iPhone

entry.title: Forest 專注森林 - 讀書專注番茄鐘
entry.id: Forest 專注森林 - 讀書專注番茄鐘-mo-1747576925404
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：USD 3.99 → 免費 [免費 ~ USD 3.99]）

应用描述

## 136 國家中排名第一名的生產力工具 app；超過兩百萬付費用戶的專注神器 ## 我們的用戶在世界各地種下超過 1,500,000 棵真樹 ## 簡單有趣的方式幫助您保持專注，培養高效率的生活習慣 紐約時報：「如果你想要放下手機、專注當下，真誠地和你的家人朋友們渡過相聚的時光，Forest 是你的最佳選擇。」 數位時代：「好的習慣必須要一段時間養成，要改善低頭族、不時會滑手機的症狀也不是一天兩天，記得多多使用這款App來幫助你改掉壞習慣，重新找回專注的自己。」 不論你是在圖書館讀書或是在辦公室上班，每當你希望有一段專心工作或學習的時間，你可以在 Forest 中種下一顆種子。在接下來的時間內，這顆種子將會慢慢地成長為一棵大樹。若是你禁不起誘惑，在這段時間內離開這個 app，你充滿生機、可愛的小樹將會枯萎而死。每一天，你都會有一片森林種滿了你今天所有茁壯的大樹，每一棵樹都代表了你曾經努力的時光。伴隨著畫面中生長的小樹，成就感以及責任感將會幫助你暫時離開手機，全心投入到手邊的工作，建立高效率與專注的生活習慣。 #治療拖延症 #提升時間效率 #遇見心流 #戒除手機成癮 保持專注，拒當低頭族！ 保持專注： • 基於番茄工作法（番茄鐘）把時間抓回自己手中 • 種植漂亮的小樹，並專注於生活中更重要的事情上 • 因應不同專注情境，自訂你的應用程式允許名單，種樹時名單外的 App 將會被屏蔽（iOS 16 以上） • 用你專注的時光，一點一滴茁壯你的森林 滿滿的成就感： • 和朋友們分享你的成果並與全世界的使用者一同競賽 • 用專注的時光累積 Forest 金幣，解鎖超過 90 種精心設計的大樹、灌木及背景白噪音 • 與家人、好友一起，開始一局種樹挑戰 • 達成成就獲得額外獎勵 • 在保持專心的同時，與 Trees for the Future 一起為世界種下真正的樹苗 歷史回顧： • 自定義任務標籤，讓你花在各個任務的時間分配一目瞭然，幫助助你自主時間管理 • 回顧你一週、一個月甚至一整年累積的大森林 • 可追蹤你每日的手機使用時數與頻率 • 以時間軸的形式回顧你在 Forest 經歷的專注旅程 • 將你的專心時間記錄在蘋果健康 App 現在就放下手機，種出專屬自己的專注森林！ 注意事項： • Forest 是一個 iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch 通用的應用程式，買一次即可在不同 iOS 設備上使用。於 iPhone, iPad 能使用上述提及的完整功能，於 Apple Watch 可提供查看今日專注紀錄以及顯示即時專注狀態。若要下載/解鎖其他非 iOS 平台的版本需要另外購買，不過只要登入同一個 Forest 帳號，你的帳號資料便可以在不同平台的設備間同步。 • 由於 iOS 系統限制，允許名單功能需要 iOS/iPadOS 16 以上才能使用。iOS/iPadOS 15 以下的裝置無法使用允許名單，在種樹時離開 Forest 會導致小樹枯萎。 • 種植真樹功能因為預算限制，每個帳號最多只能兌換五棵真樹。除此之外，我們時常會有一些限時活動可以種植更多的真樹，請記得關注我們的社交平台訊息，或是 app 內部通知。 • Forest 在 App Store 上僅有此唯一版本，其他雷同或是刻意假冒 Forest 的軟體皆不是本團隊開發的產品，感謝您對於原創者的支持！ 你可以在這些社群平台找到我們：： 在 Facebook 給我們個讚: https://www.facebook.com/forestapp.cc/ 在 Twitter 跟隨我們: https://twitter.com/forestapp_cc 在 Instagram 追蹤我們: https://www.instagram.com/forest_app/ 我們還有提供瀏覽器的擴充套件，立即前往 www.forestapp.cc 查看吧！ - 音效設計 : Shi Kuang Lee

entry.title: Dumb Phone: 簡約主畫面
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：USD 2.99 → 免費 [免費 ~ USD 2.99]）

应用描述

Dumb Phone 是一款簡約的應用程式啟動器，旨在讓您的主螢幕保持乾淨，沒有任何通知，從而幫助您減少使用螢幕的時間。 Dumb Phone 可完全自訂，讓您選擇對您最重要的應用程式，並以簡單、簡約的介面顯示在主螢幕上。 無論您喜歡深色或淺色模式，這款啟動器都能很好地配合，讓您選擇最適合自己的檢視方式。 使用 Dumb Phone，保持專注，簡化您的數位生活。

entry.title: 全民RPG：重啟
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：USD 0.99 → 免費 [免費 ~ USD 0.99]）

应用描述

召集傳說英雄，挑戰無盡關卡！ 自動戰鬥、採礦、強化通通都有！ 真正的放置型奇幻 RPG，即使離線也能持續成長！ * 組建擁有獨特技能的英雄戰隊，發揮戰略優勢！ * 利用礦坑系統收集資源！打造裝備所需的一切盡在其中！ * 挑戰強大的首領，獲得傳說級獎勵！ * 自動成長系統，讓忙碌的你也能輕鬆遊玩！ * 多樣化內容：地城、遺物、進化、傳說裝備等你來體驗！ 立即下載，開始書寫屬於你的傳奇！ 馬上開始遊戲，收集你的英雄吧！

entry.title: RadarOmega
entry.content:
优惠信息

App 內購買項目

  • Data Level Beta：USD 89.99 → USD 8.99 [USD 8.99 ~ USD 89.99]

应用描述

Welcome to RadarOmega, the next-generation weather app that takes high-resolution weather data to a whole new level. More than just radar, RadarOmega provides unique data solutions for all types of weather data that are customizable depending on your needs, whether that's before, during, or after the storm. Dedicated to providing solutions to our industry, RadarOmega created an exclusive network of weather stations featuring live video and sensor data called cyclonePORT. RadarOmega and cyclonePORT work closely with universities, emergency managers, broadcast meteorologists, and more to provide solutions for relaying critical weather information when life-threatening weather situations are imminent. RadarOmega provides high-resolution radar data for the United States, Canada, Germany, Australia, and South Korea. Base Application -NEW Warning Display Dialog -NEW Hi-Res Storm Relative Velocity -MRMS Reflectivity -Hi-Res Single Site Radar Data -30 Frames of Data -7 Day Radar History -Lightning Detection/Animation -24 Hour Storm Reports -SPC Convective Outlooks & Watches -NHC Tropical Suite & Hurricane Hunter -WPC Excessive Rainfall Outlooks -Mesoscale Discussions (Severe, Winter, & Precip.) -CPC Temp. & Precip. Outlooks -Fire Weather Outlooks & Drought Monitor -WPC Winter Forecasts & WSSI -METARS -Real-Time NWS Storm-Based Warnings -Non-Precip Watches/Warnings for USA -Flash Animation & In-App Sound Alert for All Alerts -WPC Surface Analysis -Buoy Data & Tide Forecasts -NEXRAD Hail History -Spotter Network Locations -Power Outage Layer -Map Type Customization -Detailed City & Road Network -15 Custom Locations with a Linked RadarOmega Account -Drawing, Data Viewer, & Distance Tools -Storm Track Drawing Tool -Share Screenshot & Video -Push Notifications for All Storm-Based Watches/Warnings Using GPS Location -Access to cyclonePORT Network Gamma -Hi-Res Satellite Data -Lightning Detection/Animation, METARS, & GLM for Mesoscale & Storm-Based Satellite Sectors -National Digital Forecast Database -Access to Project MesoVort -75 Frames of Data -Dual View Radar with 30 Frames -Smoothing for Radar/Satellite -30 Day Radar History -6 Month Storm Report Archive -3D Radar/Satellite -Upload 3 Custom Color Tables -30 Custom Locations with Icon Upload -2 Custom Location Lists -Push Notifications Open to All Weather Alerts Using GPS Location ONLY (max of 8 at a time) Beta *Everything in Gamma PLUS* -MRMS Data -150 Frames of Data -Dual View Radar/Satellite with 50 Frames -Smoothing for MRMS -90 Day Radar History -5 Year Storm Report Archive -3D MRMS -Upload 8 Custom Color Tables -75 Custom Locations with Icon Upload -5 Custom Location Lists Alpha *Everything in Beta PLUS* -Volumetric Radar -Model Data with Contours for HRRR, NAM3KM, NAM12KM, RAP, GFS, ECMWF, HWRF, & HMON -250 Frames of Data -Dual View Radar/Satellite with 100 Frames -Quad View Radar/Satellite on iPad & Desktop with 50 Frames -Smoothing for Models -90 Day Radar History -10 Year Storm Report Archive -Upload 30 Custom Color Tables -150 Custom Locations with Icon Upload -10 Custom Location Lists -1 Site Lightning Monitoring with Custom Range Zones -Push Notifications Open to All Weather Alerts for up to 3 Custom Locations and GPS Locations (max of 8 at a time) Additional Add-Ons -Rapid Sweep Subscriptions are maintained through the iOS App Store. We will work with our customers however, refunds must be done through the iOS App Store. Please be sure to reach out to our support team if you have any problems, questions, or concerns. For Support- You can create a ticket and we will resolve it as soon as possible: https://radaromegawx.supportbee.io/portal/sign_in See our Terms of Service below: https://www.radaromega.com/terms.php

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad
